heading: 一个风和日丽、凉风习习的早上, Da Ming is still sleeping, but then the alarm rings. Should he wake up?
Da Ming gets ready to go to school and leaves energetically! (100% move speed)
Da Ming gets caned 10 times and now his back is sore! (50% move speed)

A person enters the MRT station and behaves suspiciously. Da Ming, engrossed in playing Mobile Legends, doesn't notice the suspicious behavior. The suspicious person places a black backpack on a seat, catching Da Ming's attention. Da Ming tries to locate the person, eventually finding him and informing him about the forgotten bag. The person ignores Da Ming and flees, leaving him feeling dejected. Da Ming returns to the platform and hears an announcement urging passengers to report suspicious individuals or items to staff or use the emergency communication button. What should Da Ming do now?

choices.label: Ignore it
choices.endMessage: The bomb explodes and you die.

heading: Station staff removes it and you successfully enter the MRT train!
Da Ming boards the train. As the announcer says “Next station: Tan Kah Kee 陈嘉庚”...

Boom!!!!!!! A bomb explodes on the train. Da Ming fell to the ground with a loud thud. There is rubble everywhere, blood sparsely spewed over the ground. He notices people rushing for the exit, but the old men sitting on the reserved seats need help. He has to help them to the exit!
Use arrow keys to control Da Ming's character. Bring the old men to the exit, which is the green part on the left.

He did it! He survived the explosion and lived to tell the tale! Da Ming, being the gigachad he is, used his jawline to carve his way out of the rubble and exited the train tunnel. He calmly makes his way to school.
Things go on as usual, lessons go by, and during Math class, the announcement “dry ground, dry ground” plays over the PA. But, there was no drill planned that week?

choices.label: It must be a terrorist attack! Quick, Da Ming should run for his life!!!!
choices.endMessage: Da Ming run out of the classroom and bump headfirst into the terrorist. After an awkward exchange and some small talk, Da Ming is shot.

heading: Da Ming and his class continues waiting for further announcement. They are now ordered to evacuate. But his math teacher shouts: EVERYONE STAY HERE! ALL OF YOU MUST FINISH YOUR COMPLETING THE SQUARE WORKSHEET BEFORE YOU CAN GO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

choices.label: Continue grinding math problems as a diligent student
choices.endMessage: Five minutes later, the terrorist enters the room. Reading the tense situation and Da Ming's scary math teacher, he sits down and starts doing math problem sums. However, he quickly remembers his goal and Da Ming misteriously passes away while doing algebraic manipulation.

choices.label: Plan a rebellion against his math teacher's instructions and begin lockdown measures

heading: Da Ming's math teacher will scold him next lesson but he will have a much higher chance of living. What does Da Ming do now?

choices.label: Arrange the tables into the shape of an amogus to confuse and hypnotize the terrorist
choices.endMessage: The terrorist laughs while holding the class at gunpoint and proceeds to sweep the classroom. Everyone dies

choices.label: Close the windows and blinds, and exert Da Ming's power as math rep to force everyone under the tables
Do Rock you in class repeatedly as a form of intimidation against terrorists
choices.endMessage: The terrorist is impressed with their school spirit! Unfortunately everyone was so enthusiastic everyone got a fatal ankle sprain while stomping.

heading: The terrorist walks past Da Ming's class. However, you soon hear gunshots in the distance... Eventually, Da Ming's class is told to evacuate the school.
